fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Chant a blessing during the day, for the next night, all evil faction members will learn they cannot kill, and their factional kill is replaced with a roleblock. (1 use)
- Look over a player, they gain Basic defense tonight, can only be used after chanting. (1 use)

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Eliminate all evil threats to the Underdogs.
